name: animation-cursor-follow
description: Cursor-following elements with spring physics. Wrap any content to make it magnetically track the mouse pointer with configurable spring stiffness and damping.
postMessage:
Import and use:

import { CursorFollow } from './components/animation-cursor-follow/CursorFollow';

<CursorFollow stiffness={150} damping={15}>
  <div className="cursor-dot" />
</CursorFollow>
